requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

  • Additional Notes: Proprietary drives may be necessary to use.
